name: example-site
description: A site that serves static resources.  Used to test our implementation of Maygh.

scripts.start: cp $MAYGH_HOME/src/client/client.js $MAYGH_HOME/example-site/public/js/maygh-client.js && cp $MAYGH_HOME/src/client/util.js $MAYGH_HOME/example-site/public/js/maygh-util.js && cd $MAYGH_HOME/src/coordinator && npm install && npm start & cd $MAYGH_HOME/example-site && node server.js

author: vmayar
